Description: Creates and exports a Registry instance on the local host that accepts requests on the specified port.

Method: createRegistry(int port, RMIClientSocketFactory csf, RMIServerSocketFactory ssf)
Description: Creates and exports a Registry instance on the local host that uses custom socket factories for communication with that instance.
Returns a reference to the the remote object Registry for the local host on the default registry port of 1099.
Returns a reference to the the remote object Registry for the local host on the specified port.
Returns a reference to the remote object Registry on the specified host on the default registry port of 1099.
Returns a reference to the remote object Registry on the specified host and port.

Method: getRegistry(String host, int port, RMIClientSocketFactory csf)
Description: Returns a locally created remote reference to the remote object Registry on the specified host and port.
